summary: Willow Companion is half Bosmer and half Breton. She is a petite woman, and probably the shortest you\'ve ever met. She\'s a day dreamer and a wandering bard. You\'ll find her performing her music in Whiterun. Pretty deadly with a bow. She\'ll get knocked down but will not die.  She will level with your character.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a collective effort of DreamBurrow and Jacktthompson.  Hope you enjoy it!!

Willow\'s Story
================
Willow is half Bosmer and half Breton. She is a petite woman, and probably the shortest you\'ve ever met. She\'s a day dreamer and a wandering bard. You\'ll find her performing her music in Whiterun. Pretty deadly with a bow. She\'ll get knocked down but will not die.  She will level with your character.

Willow\'s Schedule
=================
She can be found dancing terribly or playing her flute at the marketplace in the morning. You\'ll find her wandering around Whiterun in the evening. She may also be found at the Banneredmare playing her lute and singing, especially at night. 

Willow\'s Skills
=================
She\'s a ranger, a pretty decent one, with many perks. 
She\'s better with light armor, and good at one handed and archery. 

Willow\'s Armor
=================
To get Willow to wear the Dreamburrow Sage Outfit Retexture, open her inventory and take it and give it back to her.  When she first appears she will be in default clothes.  The only way I could keep her from appearing naked when you first meet her.

Marrying Willow
=================
Just go to Riften, and walk into the Bee and Bard. 
A man named Maramal will be preaching. He\'ll sell you an Amulet of Mara. Just put it on and talk to Willow. She\'ll ask if you\'re interested. 

OTHER MODS RECOMMENDED (to look like screenshots)
=================
SKYRIM ENHANCED SHADERS FX ENB:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=822

Pretty Female Idles
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11954

Bethesda HD DLC textures

Various landscape and object texture improvements in STEP - Skyrim Total Enhancement Project: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11

INCOMPATIBILITIES
=================
None that we know of.

CAVEATS
=================
Body textures are hi-res...because they look the best :) May experience some fps drop.  My experience is a few fps at most, however there are a lot of different rigs out there so if anyone has a huge problem let me know.

INSTALLATION
=================
I use TesModManager and have not tried this with NMM.  You can use a mod manager or just copy the files to your Skyrim Data directory, overwriting when it asks you (after making a backup of course... ;) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5010

BOSS Load Order Sorting is highly recommended
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6

BOSS will most likely not recognize Willow so make sure she is with any other followers/companions in your load order. She should be toward the end of your load order after custom weapons and armors but before things like Enhanced Character Edit or Extended Color sliders.

UNINSTALL
=================
Dismiss Willow, Clean save, Uninstall with your Mod Manager or delete the files from your data directory.

TROUBLESHOOTING
=================
1. Make sure there is a folder called WillowBody in your Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\ folder.
2. Make sure there is a dds file in Textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\WillowFollower.esp folder
3. Make sure WillowFollower is checked in your load order.
4. Make sure you are outside of Whiterun before loading Willow. 
5. If you are having the Bethesda face discoloration bug try opening the console, select Willow with your mouse pointer and type setnpcweight 50 then close and reopen the console, select Willow again and type setnpcweight 10 to see if this fixes the issue.
6. I found another Bethesda bug with leveling. If you cannot get Willow to level when your character goes up a level, try opening the console before recruiting her, selecting Willow with your mouse pointer, type \"disable\", close the console, reopen the console, select Willow again, then type \"enable\".

CREDITS
=================
Skin and Body Texture Dimonized UNP by dimon99: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

Additional Textures by navetsea:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

UNP fitness body by SvarogNL: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16731

RANs Headmesh: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127

Elf Ears by numenume:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13173

Hair by Apachii:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Eyebrows Match Hair by Aluminumfoil: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=627

Flans Eyes by DarNilavu (original textures by DustinFlan):
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14539

Freckles by Zhoken:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=515

Sage Outfit Retexture by Dreamburrow: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17699

Original Sage Outfit Backsteppo: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9387

Calientes Texture Blender:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5737

UNP Neckblend by SvarogNL:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15921

UNP Bodyblend by SvarogNL:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16263

Nifskope: http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope

Bethesda for the game engine.

Note: I have received approval to use almost all of these.  There are a couple that have not been online in a while or with full inboxes.  If you are one of the ones I did not hear back from and you see your mod here and have an issue with it being used here, please let me know and I will swap it out for another.  Thank you!

Thanks for downloading!!
~DreamBurrow ~Jacktthompson
author: Jacktthompson and DreamBurrow
